description: Assumption of risk - voluntary participation in dangerous activity
facts: Spectator sat in an unscreened section
A foul ball struck the spectator
The stadium had posted warnings about foul balls
Screened seating was available but spectator chose unscreened seats
asp_facts: claim(c1). claim_type(c1, negligence). defendant(c1, stadium). plaintiff(c1, spectator). duty_owed(c1, yes). duty_breached(c1, no). assumption_of_risk(c1, yes). risk_known(c1, yes). risk_voluntary(c1, yes). actual_cause(c1, yes). damages(c1, 5000). injury_type(c1, physical).
question: Can the spectator recover damages from the stadium?
rationale: The spectator assumed the risk of being hit by a foul ball. The risk was known (warnings posted), voluntary (chose unscreened seats when screened seats were available), and inherent to the activity. Assumption of risk bars recovery.
